body_html:
@fesun: Thanks for the contribution. A quick follow up: could you elaborate on the exception thrown that prompted the change to array_grad.py? Is there a unittest/code snippet you could share that causes the exception?

(array_ops.shape would throw an exception on all platforms if the provided tensor had a dimension that doesn't fit in 32-bits. So I'm trying to understand what the platform specific part is. Thanks!)

body:
@fesun: Thanks for the contribution. A quick follow up: could you elaborate on the exception thrown that prompted the change to `array_grad.py`? Is there a unittest/code snippet you could share that causes the exception?

(`array_ops.shape` would throw an exception on all platforms if the provided tensor had a dimension that doesn't fit in 32-bits. So I'm trying to understand what the platform specific part is. Thanks!)
